page.title: 18Religion-Witton & Ridlington
page.content: {Church of England}Ancient Anglican Churches are in use at Witton & Ridlington,Witton with a round Saxon tower.These are part of a grouped parish of four churches served by one priest who is the vicar of Bacton.Both Witton & Ridlington churches have burial grounds in use.A question mark hangs over the future of Ridlington Church. {Methodist}A disused Primitive Methodist Chapel in Witton has been turned into a private house,and Methodists have to go to the Chapel in N.Walsham. {Baptists}There is no Baptist Chapel nearer than Bacton. {Roman Catholics}The nearest Roman Catholic Curch is in N.Walsham.
